QuestData.Title: Baron Sablemane's Poison
QuestData.Description: Here, take this to your master. I'm sure that whatever the reason, Rexxar will put it to good use.$B$BOh, and do be certain to remind him that he owes me.$B$BHe knows what I want, and I'm certain that however he intends to obtain it for me, I'll be seeing you again sooner than you think.$B$BNow, do be a good little $g boy : girl; and run this up to Rexxar.
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver Baron Sablemane's Poison to Rexxar at Thunderlord Stronghold in the Blade's Edge Mountains.
QuestData.CompletionText: $C, you are back so soon? Do you have the poison?
QuestData.RewardText: This is unsavory business, this use of poisons. But it will do what we want.
